name: Donchian Channels Breakout Scanner
question: Which stocks are breaking out of Donchian Channel high/low ranges?
retailQuestion: Which stocks just broke to new highs?
description: Identifies stocks breaking above Donchian Channel upper band (highest high) or below lower band (lowest low) over specified periods. Analyzes breakout quality, volume confirmation, and channel width to validate genuine trend initiation versus false breakouts.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for Donchian Channel breakout screening
Step 2: Get historical price data for Donchian Channel calculation and breakout identification
Step 3: Get current market data for real-time breakout confirmation
Step 4: Calculate Donchian Channels and identify high/low breakouts with volume validation
Step 5: Rank breakouts by channel significance and trend initiation probability

followUp: Should I buy stocks that just hit new highs?
